posts.post_content:
This has got to be one of my favorite flavor texts ever xD  
That being said, it's not a terribly good card. I mean it does pretty good with [Hatching Plans](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hatching Plans), and maybe [Bridge from Below](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bridge from Below) if by some strange twist of fate you accidentally played it or revived it and need it rekilled?

Posted By: ObsessedAddict (7/9/2011 12:13:09 PM)

posts.post_content:
Indeed. With [Rancor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rancor) this becomes ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol):+2/+2 and trample until end of turn, plus a +2/+0 boost on the last one. And then you have a [Sigil of the Empty Throne](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sigil of the Empty Throne) and either a [Femeref Enchantress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Femeref Enchantress) or a [Mesa Enchantress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Mesa Enchantress) out.   
  
...Time to make an enchantment deck.
posts.html:

...Time to make an enchantment deck.

posts.post_content:
[Spring Cleaning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spring Cleaning) with Isochron is the better choice when Enchanted Evening is involved, especially with library manipulation cards like [Brainstorm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brainstorm) and [Halimar Depths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Halimar Depths).  
  
But yes, interesting creature when used in the right deck.
